'''2.2.2725''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.2724''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.2730''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on May 5, 2021.

== Changes ==
* Fixed build breaks on Unix-like systems
* Fixed an issues with Windows not logging 'proper looking' paths in logs.
* Various fixes on MacOS builds to improve reliability
* Updated bootstrapper to remove dependency on <code>vcruntime140.dll</code>.
* Added additional logging to catch CDN problems.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-17433}} - First three columns of launcher log are displayed darker than they were previously.
* {{Bug|MCL-17472}} - Several search fields in the launcher are not selected when clicking on the search icon.</onlyinclude>
